section.title:
count slips
edit list for Count Slip Edit List
section.para: To edit count slips entered for an associated count tag, go to Inventory > Physical Inventory > Reports > Count Slip Edit List. The following screen will appear:
When displaying the count slip edit list, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the count tag number of the count tag whose count slips you want to display.
Displays item number automatically when count tag number is entered into Count Tag # field.
Displays site where count tag and count slips originate from.
Display lists the count slip edit list, using the specified parameters.
